channel.title: Standards on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Standards on Home

item.title: Offshore containers
item.description: We produce special containers and equipment intended for petroleum industry. The containers are of the offshore type which means they are certified according to respective standards for reloading on an open sea.

item.title: Quality and certificates
item.description: Production quality requirements have been continuously increasing. To meet these demands, our company has successfully implemented and maintained certifications for internationally recognized quality management standards, demonstrating our commitment to excellence and continuous improvement.
